headline: Commodity trade faces geopolitical turbulence, Willis reports
summary: LONDON, Oct. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Commodity traders are facing renewed geopolitical risks as military conflicts proliferate, tariffs increase, and global supply chains come under pressure, although these challenges could drive volatility-driven profits for some players, according to a new report from by Willis, a WTW business (NASDAQ: WTW), Managing the new economic risks in commodity trading. Recent market volatility in response to US tariff threats against China highlight the report’s
